footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle1: Welcome to a journey of healing and self-discovery. In this sacred space, we invite you to explore the depths of your being, guided by the wisdom of the Amazon jungle.
heroSubtitle2: Facilitated by experts in spiritual guidance, this ceremony offers a unique opportunity to cleanse, release, and reconnect with your most authentic essence.
pastEventsSubtitle: Relive the magic of our past encounters.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Discover our upcoming dates and the details of each sacred gathering.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred plant, its benefits, and its ancestral wisdom.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guardians who will accompany you on your journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social networks to stay up to date with the latest news, events, and inspiring content on the healing path.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies at this time. Please check back soon.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step towards a deep and transformative experience. Discover how to align your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
ayahuascaInfoTitle: The Sacred Medicine of the Jungle
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew obtained from the cooking of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). In tradition, it is known as the 'rope of the spirits,' a bridge to the inner and spiritual world.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Chacruna contains Dimethyltryptamine (DMT), a visionary molecule that our body naturally produces. The Ayahuasca vine, in turn, contains monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs) that allow DMT to be activated in the brain, opening the door to deep introspection, emotional healing, and expansion of consciousness.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Medicine as a Spiritual Teacher
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is not a drug, but a teacher. It works on multiple levels: physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual. It helps to purge toxins, release emotional traumas, dissolve energetic blockages, and reveal unconscious patterns, guiding you towards a deeper understanding of yourself and your purpose in life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, your relationships, and your path. Ayahuasca can help you find answers and define a clearer purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and ingrained negative patterns. The medicine allows you to face and heal past wounds in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with nature, and with the universe. Many describe a feeling of unity and unconditional love.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a circle of trust. Group ceremonies enhance the experience through collective energy and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed for deep and individualized work with the direct guidance of our masters.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the guardians who will accompany you on this sacred journey. Each one brings their wisdom, love, and deep connection with the medicine.
preparationProcessDescription: It begins with a diet and a clear intention to align body and spirit.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A guided introspective journey in a safe and sacred space.
experienceProcessDescription: Receive visions, healing, and revelations for your personal growth.
integrationProcessDescription: Apply the teachings of the ceremony in your daily life for lasting transformation.
dietTitle: Sacred Diet: The Food of the Spirit
dietSubtitle: Preparing the body is fundamental. We recommend starting this diet at least 3 to 5 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Whole grains like rice, quinoa, and oats
Water, herbal teas, and natural juices without sugar
prohibitedFoodsList: Spicy, fermented, or heavily seasoned food
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state is the compass for your journey. Dedicate time to prepare your inner self.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind. Seek moments of silence to connect with yourself.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal or understand? Write down your intentions to guide your experience.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to note your thoughts and emotions before and after the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring repressed emotions to the surface. Prepare to be vulnerable, to forgive, and to receive love. Trust the process; the medicine will show you what you need to see, not always what you want to see. The key is surrender and trust.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and a smooth experience.
comfortItemsList: Blanket, pillow, and yoga mat or sleeping pad
essentialsList: Respect for the medicine, the guides, and others
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerContinueWith: Or sign up with your email

errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.

defaultContributionText: Loving contribution to sustain the space and the medicine.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The guide will be permanently deleted.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, access exclusive content, and prepare for your ceremony.

userManagementSubtitle: Manage registered users and their roles.
allUsersDescription: View and manage all registered users.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I invite you to complete our health questionnaire to prepare for The Art of Healing ceremony. Please click this link: [QUESTIONNAIRE_URL]
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder:
Hello everyone!

This is a message for the community.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the answers provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
allConversationsDescription: Explore the history of user interactions with the chatbot.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I am here to accompany you on your healing path. How can I help you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
tourWelcomeDescription: To start your journey with us, please confirm your phone number. This will help us stay in touch for the next steps.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We'll never share your number with anyone else.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see video memories of our past ceremonies. A little taste of the magic!
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our upcoming ceremonies. Click on any to see details and prices.
tourStepFinal: Great! The final step is to complete a brief health questionnaire. This is crucial to ensure your experience is safe and profound. Let's go!
questionnaireDescription: Your answers are confidential and essential to ensure a safe and transformative experience. Please answer with complete honesty.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your answers have been received and will be reviewed by our guides. You can review your answers below.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high/low blood pressure, epilepsy, diabetes, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: If you answered yes, please detail your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs) or other psychiatric drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If you answered yes, please list the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: If you answered yes, please provide more details.
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive medicinal plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If you answered yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what do you hope to gain from this experience?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm looking to heal emotional wounds, find clarity in my life's purpose, connect with my spirituality...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved securely. They will be reviewed by our guides.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
errorRequiredDetails: If you answered 'yes', please provide details.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessTitle: All Set for the Next Step!
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed a fundamental part of your preparation. We recommend exploring our preparation guide to align your body and mind for the ceremony.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the homepage. You can use a URL or upload a file.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please provide a video URL or select a file to upload.
